item.title: Why my console app gets stuck
item.description: In my current project, we have a console app that runs in the background and sends data to a frontend application. The app works great but sometimes it stops working and we need to press a key for it to continue. It turned out it was because of Windows Console’s Quick Mode feature. When a user clicks on the console window, it hangs the app execution to allow the user to select the text..
